name: Racing GM
description:
►►► Select your racing team and advance to the top of the motorsport world ◄◄◄

Racing GM is a simple and minimalistic racing manager game which puts you in control of a racing team. You can control lots of different aspects of your team from developing your car and hiring drivers to enhance your team facilitiy and sponsors.
The game is meant to be no in depth simulation. It is a fast paced game where you can get through a season in about 15 minutes.

Do you know what it takes to get to the top of the championship?


► FEATURES
• Select one of 10 teams
• 16 simulated races per season
• Racing events to make the races more unpredictable
• Fire drivers or hire better ones
• Enhance yor team facilitiy
• Develope & improve your car
• Sign sponsorship contracts
• Compete for the Drivers / Team Championship
• Manage your finances
• German & English language
• No IAP / Ads


► SUPPORT
If you have some suggestions or any other question regarding this game, feel free to contact me at:
http://circulsupport.wufoo.com/forms/circul-support/


► DEVICES
This game supports iPhone/iPod Touch only!
More specific it supports iPhone 5, 5S, 5C, 6, 6+,7, 7+ & iPod touch devices from the 5th generation and later


Thanks to all players who supported this game!
